Name: TDS - War Games
About the game: TDS - War Games is a local pvp party game where you and your friends fight viciously over the objective for the title of victor. Fast paced, top-down perspective action. 2 - 4 local split-screen multiplayer. Several unique arenas varying in size, scope and theme. Customizable player loadouts. Customizable game modes. Including familiar game modes such as, Death Match. King of the Hill. Capture the Flag.
Meta Title: TDS - War Games: Jun 7, 2022, Joseph Alban and Full Overview
Meta Description: Looking for information on TDS - War Games? Check out the release date (Jun 7, 2022), developer insights from Joseph Alban, and a complete game summary.
